features.backgroundFeatures:
--- Safe Haven ---
As a faction agent, you have access to a secret newtork of supporters and operatives who can provide assistance onyour adventures. You know a set of secret signs and passwords you can use to identify such operatives, who can provide you with access to a hidden safe house, free room and board, or assistance in finding information. These agents never risk their lives for you or risk revealing their true identities.
features.classFeatures:
--- Arcane Recovery ---
Once per day when finishing a short rest, recvoer a number of spell slots with a combined level no greater than half your wizard level (rounded up)
None of these slots can be 6th level or higher

--- Spellcasting ---
Cantrips
Spellbook
Prepare a number of spells equial to INT mod + wizard level
Ritual casting
Copying a spell into your spellbook takes 2 hours and 50 GP per level of spell
Copying from a scroll requires making an Arcana check (DC = 10 + spell level)
The scroll is destroyed regardless of whether the copying is a success or failure

--- Conjuration Savant ---
Half time and money to copy a conjuration spell into your spellbook

--- Minor Conjuration ---
Action to conjure an inanimate object no more than 3 feet in any dimension and no more than 10 pounds
Radiates dim light out 5 feet
Disappears after 1 hour, when you use this feature again, if it takes any damage, or if it deals any damage

--- Benign Transposition ---
Action to teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space or to swap places with a willing creature of size small or medium
Once used, this feature can't be used again until you finish a long rest or cast a conjuratino spell of 1st level or higher

--- Focused Conjuration
While concentrating on a conjuration spell, your concentration can't be broken as a result of taking damage
features.raceFeatures:
--- Darkvision ---
60 ft.

--- Hellish Resistance ---
Resistance to fire damage

--- Infernal Legacy ---
Know the thaumaturgy cantrip
Can cast hellish rebuke as a 2nd-level spell once per long rest
Can cast darknesss once per long rest

notes.notes1:
From Calimshan, a village South of Callimport
Worked for a mage guild before escaping and becoming assosiated with the Hosttower of the Arcane
